flawed_nl_solution:
The tickets for both of her brothers will cost her $10 * 2 = $<<10*2=20>>20.
To buy tickets for all of them, it will cost Isabelle $20 + $20 = $<<20+20=40>>40.
Between all of them, they have saved a total of $5 + $5 = $<<5+5=7>>7.
Since they have already saved $7, she needs to earn an additional $40 - $7 = $<<33=33>>33 to afford the tickets.
Since she makes $3 per week, it will take her $33 / ($3/week) = <<33/(3)=11>>11 weeks to save enough money for all of the tickets.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
